title: Once upon a Kiss
description: Three loved fairy tales are transformed into delightful Regency romances at the talented hands of these favorite Zebra authors. This magical collection includes: "Aladdin's Lamp" by Carola Dunn, "The Seven Ravens" by Karla Hooker, and "The Emperor's Nightingale" by Judith A. Lansdowne.
author: Carola Dunn
